DOC.brief_summary: Subjects screen within 28 day . Each treatment session consist 2 PSG night , study drug administration noise model conduct second night .
DOC.criteria: Body weight =50 kg BMI within range 18.529.9 kg/m2 inclusive Healthy judge responsible physician . No clinically significant abnormality identify medical laboratory evaluation 12lead ECG ; The subject show normal sleep pattern basis evaluation PSG screen night . Normal sleep define follow : LPS ( Latency persistence Sleep ) < 30min. , SE ( Sleep Efficiency ) > 85 % , apnea/ hypopnea index < 10 , periodic leg movement ( PLM ) arousal index < 10 . The apnea/hypopnea index define `` number apneas hyponeas divide total sleep time ( TST ) express hour '' . PLMI define `` number periodic leg movement associate arousal awaken divide total sleep time ( TST ) express hour '' . A positive result prestudy urine drug/ alcohol breath screen . Abuse alcohol . Subject complains sleep disturbance /or receive treatment sleep disorder .
